channel.title: Flowers on duy's life entries
channel.description: Recent content in Flowers on duy's life entries

item.title: flowers pt2
item.description: I bought some more flowers from wholefoods, but this time i didnt arrange it this time. they had a person there wrapping flowers and everything; however, lowkey, i thought they would wrap it better! i think i’ll learn how to wrap better tooo!!

item.title: flowers!!
item.description:
i arranged some flowers i bought from whole foods!

i think i bought like 4 different flowers, and then lowkey i think it was lik around 35 bucks or smth total.

i really like them!!

i wanna buy and arrange flowers every week,,, but i dont think i have the money to do so…
